data.title: Buddy Brown - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Buddy Brown: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Singer, performer, musician, and entertainer who first built his fan base on social media with songs about conservative values. His albums include Mason Jar, Deep South, Patriot, and Truck Sessions. In the year 2017, Orlando Magic chose his song "Rowdy Side" as the team's theme for the season.

Before Fame

In the year 2005, he graduated from Mississippi State University with a degree in psychology.

Trivia

His EPs include titles like Buddy Brown, Keepin' It Country, Hometown Anthems, Hurricane Stomp, and Just Sayin'. In the year 2015, he opened for Jon Pardi at the Clay County Fairgrounds in Green Cove Springs, Florida. He has amassed more than 1.1 million subscribers on his Buddy Brown YouTube channel.

Family Life

At the young age of nine, he and his family moved to Orlando, Florida.

Associated With
